title: Create FO-02 E2E test file
description:
Create e2e/fo-02.test.ts based on fo-01.test.ts pattern:

Test scenarios:
1. Complete flow through all 3 batches
2. Verify loading throbber appears before each batch
3. Verify each batch generation completes successfully
4. Verify no duplicate affirmations across batches
5. Verify completion screen shows approved affirmations

Key differences from FO-01 test:
- Must wait for 3 separate generation calls (not just 1)
- Loading states appear between batches
- Each batch takes up to 60s for AI generation

See SPEC.md section 'E2E Tests' and docs/current/e2e-testing.md.
acceptance_criteria: E2E test file created, covers all 3 batch generations
closed_reason: Created e2e/fo-02.test.ts with comprehensive test for the full 3-batch iterative flow
